Description: Unique nuclei barcode; added at transposition step. Determines which nucleus the reads originated from

Cell Barcode and DNA Insert, Sample Index and DNA Insert, DNA Insert, Sample Index, Cell Barcode

Attribute: Median Fraction of Reads in Peaks
Description: Median fraction of reads in peaks (FRIP)

Attribute: Median Fraction of Reads in Annotated cis DNA Elements
Description: Median fraction of reads in annotated cis-DNA elements (FRIADE)

Attribute: Median Percentage of Mitochondrial Reads per Nucleus

Description: Generic name of peaks calling tool
